thread.title: What to watch on Netflix UK in March 2017 - the best movies and TV shows being added
thread.title_full: What to watch on Netflix UK in March 2017 - the best movies and TV shows being added

author: Jo-Anne Rowney
title: What to watch on Netflix UK in March 2017 - the best movies and TV shows being added
text:
Get celebs     
Another month, another raft of new shows and movies on Netflix. 
There's two big shows dropping, Marvel's Iron Fist - following on from Daredevil, Jessica Jones and Luke Cage - and 13 Reasons Why, Selena Gomez's passion project. 
There's the first season of South Korean fantasy drama One More Time (March 10) and Rooney Mara and Jason Segel star as lovers in The Discovery (March 31). 
Sundance films are winging their way to Netflix too, from Burning Sands to Deidra & Laney Rob a Train. Tom Hanks' fans are treated to Captain Phillips and A Hologram for the King. If you've just ogled Ryan Gosling in La La Land you get another chance in The Nice Guys. 
Here's what to watch on Netflix this March. 
...if you're looking for February's list check our here . 
March 1
